snippet: A new bill aims to close the “gun-show loophole” by requiring background checks in sales at such events.
abstract: Proposed legislation in New Mexico aims to require background checks for purchases made at gun shows and through private sales; move marks shift in state where efforts to restrict firearms have been viewed warily.
lead_paragraph: A new bill aims to close the “gun-show loophole” by requiring background checks in sales at such events.

headline.seo: New Mexico Inches Toward Stricter Gun Controls
headline.main: Gun-Friendly New Mexico Considers Stricter Controls
headline.print_headline: Gun-Friendly New Mexico Considers Stricter Controls
